DOC.brief_summary: INTRODUCTION : Overactive bladder syndrome define The International Continence Society urgency , without incontinence , usually increase urinary frequency nocturia . It difficult estimate prevalence syndrome many patient seek medical help , despite considerable negative impact quality life . Lower urinary tract dysfunction treat use electrical stimulation posterior tibial nerve . This therapy conservative , effective , inexpensive promotes high adhesion treatment . It good result , decrease symptom urgency , urge-incontinence , urinary frequency nocturia . Due lack consensus parameter technique , research necessary . OBJECTIVE : To compare effectiveness protocol electrical stimulation posterior tibial nerve treatment non-neurogenic overactive bladder . METHODS : The study blind randomized clinical trial . The study accept 145 woman overactive bladder diagnosis least six month prior begin study . The subject divide five group : group 1 ( placebo group ) , group 2 ( electrical stimulation one leg week ) , group 3 ( electrical stimulation one leg twice week ) , group 4 ( electrical stimulation two leg one week ) group 5 ( electrical stimulation two legs twice week ) . Physical evaluation do begin end treatment . Evaluation do use King `` Health Questionnaire , International Consultation Incontinence Questionnaire - Short Form , Overactive Bladder Questionnaire , three day urinary diary table follow-up treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Posterior Tibial Nerve Electrical Stimulation Protocols Overactive Bladder Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year age ; Cognitive level adequate understanding orientation treatment ; Clinical diagnosis overactive bladder syndrome least six month prior study . Pregnant woman woman wish get pregnant ; Neurological disease ; Urinary infection ; Nephrolithiasis ; Stress urinary incontinence ; Mixed urinary incontinence ; Women pharmacological treatment overactive bladder syndrome ; Women undergo hormone replacement therapy last six month ; Peripheral neuropathy ; Cystocele stage two high .
